LanguageData.Mizu_Bullet_Snowball.label: snowball
LanguageData.Mizu_ClearIce.label: Ice (Clear water)
LanguageData.Mizu_ClearIce.description: Frozen clear water. Allows get water by licking it for a long time.
LanguageData.Mizu_ClearWater.label: Clear water
LanguageData.Mizu_ClearWater.description: Water for drinking. It will taste good.
LanguageData.Mizu_MudIce.label: Ice (Mud water)
LanguageData.Mizu_MudIce.description: Frozen mud water. Allows get water by licking it for a long time.
LanguageData.Mizu_MudWater.label: Mud water
LanguageData.Mizu_MudWater.description: Water for drinking. It will taste terrible.
LanguageData.Mizu_NormalIce.label: Ice (Water)
LanguageData.Mizu_NormalIce.description: Frozen water. Allows get water by licking it for a long time.
LanguageData.Mizu_NormalWater.label: Water
LanguageData.Mizu_NormalWater.description: Water for drinking. It has no special effects.
LanguageData.Mizu_RawIce.label: Ice (Raw water)
LanguageData.Mizu_RawIce.description: Frozen raw water. Allows get water by licking it for a long time.
LanguageData.Mizu_RawSnow.label: Snow (Raw water)
LanguageData.Mizu_RawSnow.description: A bottled snow. Allows get water by licking it for a long time.
LanguageData.Mizu_RawWater.label: Raw water
LanguageData.Mizu_RawWater.description: Water for drinking. It will taste bad slightly.
LanguageData.Mizu_SeaIce.label: Ice (Seawater)
LanguageData.Mizu_SeaIce.description: Frozen seawater. Allows get water by licking it for a long time.
LanguageData.Mizu_SeaWater.label: Seawater
LanguageData.Mizu_SeaWater.description: Water for drinking. It will taste terrible and salty.
LanguageData.Mizu_ShavedIce.label: Shaved ice
LanguageData.Mizu_ShavedIce.description: A dessert made by shaving the block of ice. Pay attention to headaches.
LanguageData.Mizu_Snowball.label: Snowball
LanguageData.Mizu_Snowball.description: a snowball got from fallen snow. Allows get water by licking it for a long time and use as a ranged weapon with zero damage.
LanguageData.Mizu_Snowball.verbs.throw_snowball.label: throw snowball
